sourcesContent:
Login is required
Login must be at least 5 characters
Login must be at most 20 characters
Email is required
Email must be a valid email address
Password is required
Password must be at least 6 characters
Registration failed!
{{ errorMessage }}
Successfully registered!
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService, AuthServiceTypes } from 'src/app/services'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './reg.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reg.component.css'], }) export class RegComponent implements OnInit { form: AuthServiceTypes.RegisterParams = { login: '', email: '', password: '', }; isSuccessful = false; isSignUpFailed = false; errorMessage = ''; constructor(private authService: AuthService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} onSubmit(): void { const { login, email, password } = this.form; this.authService.register({ login, email, password }).subscribe({ complete: () => { this.isSuccessful = true; this.isSignUpFailed = false; }, error: (err) => { this.errorMessage = err.error.message; this.isSignUpFailed = true; }, }); } }
